Summary

An expert in custom machine learning models for data analysis. Many tasks utilize specialized workflows analyzing data of specific varieties. Machine learning has the capability to enhance the workflow of experts, making intractible studies feasible. Careful construction of ML models and thoughtful sampling and data curation are key tecniques for effective analysis of data. My Ph.D. in machine learning was earned crafting specific machine learning techniques and workflows enabling new forms of data analysis and experimental design.
